io.github.dddplus.specification

接口 ISpecification<T extends IDomainModel>

  • 类型参数:
    T - The candidate business object.

    public interface ISpecification<T extends IDomainModel>
    Specification declaration，是一种显式的业务规则，一种业务约束条件.

    通过ISpecification，可以把业务规则显性化，而不是散落在各处，便于复用.

    同时，由于ISpecification的统一定义，也可以进行编排，统一处理.

    ISpecification，is part of UL(Ubiquitous Language).

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default boolean satisfiedBy(T candidate)
      Check whether a candidate business object satisfies the specification: the business rule.
      boolean satisfiedBy(T candidate, Notification notification)
      Check whether a candidate business object satisfies the specification: the business rule.

    • 方法详细资料

      • satisfiedBy

        default boolean satisfiedBy(@NotNull
                            T candidate)
        Check whether a candidate business object satisfies the specification: the business rule.
        参数:
        candidate - The candidate business object
        返回:
        true if the business rule satisfied

      • satisfiedBy

        boolean satisfiedBy(@NotNull
                    T candidate,
                    Notification notification)
        Check whether a candidate business object satisfies the specification: the business rule.
        参数:
        candidate - The candidate business object
        notification - Collect reasons why specification not satisfied. If null, will not collect unsatisfaction reasons.
        返回:
        true if the business rule satisfied
